00037 template <class DataType>
00038 class DzTArray {
00039 public:

00055     void            append( const DataType &obj );
00056     void            appendBlank();
00057     void            append( int num, const DataType *obj );
00058     int             appendIfUnique( const DataType &obj );
00059     void            insert( int i, const DataType &obj );
00060     virtual void    removeByIndex( int index, int num = 1 );
00061     void            removeFromEnd( int num = 1 );
00062     bool            remove( const DataType &obj );
00063     virtual void    clear() { m_nItems = 0; }
00064     virtual void    clearAndFree();
00065     bool            setCount( int num, bool keepExisting = true );
00066     bool            preSize( int num, bool keepExisting = true );

00073     const DataType& operator[]( int i ) const;
00074     int             count() const { return m_nItems; }
00075     bool            isEmpty() const { return (m_nItems < 1); }
00076     int             find( const DataType &obj ) const;
00077     const DataType* getValues() const { return m_items; }
00078     DataType*       getValuesUnlocked() const { return m_items; }
00079     int             size() const { return m_nItems * sizeof( DataType); }

00097 /******************************************************************************/
00098 template <class DataType>
00099 DzTArray<DataType>::DzTArray( int bSize )
00100     : m_nItems(0),
00101     m_nSlots(0),
00102     m_blockGrowSize(bSize),
00103     m_items(0)
00104 {
00105     if( m_blockGrowSize <= 0 ){
00106         DZ_WARNING( "Invalid block size specified in DzTArray::DzTArray()" );
00107         m_blockGrowSize = 1;
00108     }
00109 }

00111 /******************************************************************************/
00112 template <class DataType>
00113 DzTArray<DataType>::DzTArray( const DzTArray<DataType> &obj )
00114     : m_nItems(0),
00115     m_nSlots(0),
00116     m_blockGrowSize(obj.m_blockGrowSize),
00117     m_items(0)
00118 {
00119     if( m_blockGrowSize <= 0 )
00120     {
00121         DZ_WARNING( "Invalid block size specified in DzTArray::DzTArray()" );
00122         m_blockGrowSize = 1;
00123     }
00124 
00125     if( obj.m_nItems > 0 )
00126         append( obj.m_nItems, obj.m_items );
00127 }
00128 
00129 /******************************************************************************/
00130 template <class DataType>
00131 DzTArray<DataType>::~DzTArray()
00132 {
00133     delete [] m_items;
00134 }

00136 /******************************************************************************/
00137 template <class DataType>
00138 DzTArray<DataType>& DzTArray<DataType>::operator=( const DzTArray<DataType> &from )
00139 {
00140     clear();
00141     if( from.m_nItems > 0 )
00142         append( from.m_nItems, from.m_items );
00143 
00144     m_blockGrowSize = from.m_blockGrowSize;
00145 
00146     return *this;
00147 }

00149 /******************************************************************************/
00150 template <class DataType>
00151 DataType& DzTArray<DataType>::at( int i )
00152 {
00153     if( i >= m_nItems || i < 0 ){
00154         DZ_WARNING( "Index out of range in DzTArray::at()" );
00155         return m_items[0];
00156     }
00157 
00158     return m_items[i];
00159 }

00162 template <class DataType>
00163 DataType& DzTArray<DataType>::operator[]( int i )
00164 {
00165     if( i >= m_nItems || i < 0 ){
00166         DZ_WARNING( "Index out of range in DzTArray::operator[]" );
00167         return m_items[0];
00168     }
00169 
00170     return m_items[i];
00171 }

00173 /******************************************************************************/
00174 template <class DataType>
00175 void DzTArray<DataType>::append( const DataType &obj )
00176 {
00177     if( m_nItems >= m_nSlots ) {
00178         if( !addSpace( m_blockGrowSize ) )
00179             return;
00180     }
00181 
00182     m_items[m_nItems] = obj;
00183     m_nItems++;
00184 }
00185 
00186 /******************************************************************************/
00187 template <class DataType>
00188 void DzTArray<DataType>::appendBlank()
00189 {
00190     if( m_nItems >= m_nSlots ) {
00191         if( !addSpace( m_blockGrowSize ) )
00192             return;
00193     }
00194 
00195     m_nItems++;
00196 }
00197 
00198 /******************************************************************************/
00199 template <class DataType>
00200 void DzTArray<DataType>::append( int num, const DataType *obj )
00201 {
00202     int i;
00203 
00204     if( num < 1 ){
00205         DZ_WARNING( "Less than one item specified for adding in DzTArray::append()" );
00206         return;
00207     }
00208 
00209     if( ( m_nItems + num ) > m_nSlots ) {
00210         if( num > m_blockGrowSize ) {
00211             if( !addSpace( num ) )
00212                 return;
00213         }
00214         else {
00215             if( !addSpace( m_blockGrowSize ) )
00216                 return;
00217         }
00218     }
00219 
00220     for( i = 0; i < num; i++ )
00221         m_items[m_nItems+i] = obj[i];
00222 
00223     m_nItems += num;
00224 }
00225 
00226 /******************************************************************************/
00227 template <class DataType>
00228 int DzTArray<DataType>::appendIfUnique( const DataType &obj )
00229 {
00230     int idx = find( obj );
00231 
00232     if( idx < 0 ){
00233         idx = count();
00234         append( obj );
00235     }
00236 
00237     return idx;
00238 }
00239 
00240 /******************************************************************************/
00241 template <class DataType>
00242 void DzTArray<DataType>::insert( int where, const DataType &obj )
00243 {
00244     int i;
00245 
00246     if( where < 0 ){
00247         DZ_WARNING( "Invalid index specified in DzTArray::insert()" );
00248         where = 0;
00249     }
00250     else if( where > m_nItems ){
00251         DZ_WARNING( "Invalid index specified in DzTArray::insert()" );
00252         where = m_nItems;
00253     }
00254 
00255     if( m_nItems >= m_nSlots ) {
00256         if( !addSpace( m_blockGrowSize ) )
00257             return;
00258     }
00259 
00260     for( i = m_nItems; i > where; i-- )
00261         m_items[i] = m_items[i-1];
00262 
00263     m_items[where] = obj;
00264 
00265     m_nItems++;
00266 }
00267 
00268 /******************************************************************************/
00269 template <class DataType>
00270 void DzTArray<DataType>::removeByIndex( int index, int num )
00271 {
00272     int i;
00273 
00274     if( index < 0 || index >= m_nItems ){
00275         DZ_WARNING( "Invalid starting index specified in DzTArray::removeByIndex()" );
00276         return;
00277     }
00278 
00279     if( index + num > m_nItems ){
00280         DZ_WARNING( "Too many items specified for removal in DzTArray::removeByIndex()" );
00281         num = m_nItems - index;
00282     }
00283 
00284     if( num > m_nItems )
00285         num = m_nItems;
00286 
00287     for( i = index; i < m_nItems - num; ++i )
00288         m_items[i] = m_items[i+num];
00289     m_nItems -= num;
00290 }
00291 
00292 /******************************************************************************/
00293 template <class DataType>
00294 void DzTArray<DataType>::removeFromEnd( int num )
00295 {
00296     if( num > m_nItems ){
00297         DZ_WARNING( "Too many items specified for removal in DzTArray::removeFromEnd()" );
00298         num = m_nItems;
00299     }
00300 
00301     m_nItems -= num;
00302 }
00303 
00304 /******************************************************************************/
00305 template <class DataType>
00306 bool DzTArray<DataType>::remove( const DataType &obj )
00307 {
00308     int result = find( obj );
00309     if( result < 0 )
00310         return false;
00311 
00312     removeByIndex( result );
00313     return true;
00314 }
00315 
00316 /******************************************************************************/
00317 template <class DataType>
00318 bool DzTArray<DataType>::setCount( int num, bool keepExisting )
00319 {
00320     if( num < 0 ){
00321         DZ_WARNING( "Count less than 0 specifed in DzTArray::setCount()" );
00322         num = 0;
00323     }
00324 
00325     if( preSize( num, keepExisting ) ){
00326         m_nItems = num;
00327         return true;
00328     }
00329 
00330     return false;
00331 }
00332 
00333 /******************************************************************************/
00334 template <class DataType>
00335 bool DzTArray<DataType>::preSize( int num, bool keepExisting )
00336 {
00337     bool    status = true;
00338 
00339     if( num < 0 ){
00340         DZ_WARNING( "Count less than 0 specifed in DzTArray::preSize()" );
00341         num = 0;
00342     }
00343 
00344     if( num > m_nSlots ) {
00345         if( ( num - m_nSlots ) > m_blockGrowSize )
00346             status = addSpace( num - m_nSlots, keepExisting );
00347         else
00348             status = addSpace( m_blockGrowSize, keepExisting );
00349     }
00350 
00351     return status;
00352 }

00354 /******************************************************************************/
00355 template <class DataType>
00356 const DataType& DzTArray<DataType>::at( int i ) const
00357 {
00358     if( !(i < m_nItems && i > -1 ) ){
00359         DZ_WARNING( "Index out of range in DzTArray::at() const" );
00360         return m_items[0];
00361     }
00362 
00363     return m_items[i];
00364 }
00365 
00366 /******************************************************************************/
00367 template <class DataType>
00368 const DataType& DzTArray<DataType>::operator[]( int i ) const
00369 {
00370     if( !(i < m_nItems && i > -1 ) ){
00371         DZ_WARNING( "Index out of range in DzTArray::operator[] const" );
00372         return m_items[0];
00373     }
00374 
00375     return m_items[i];
00376 }
00377 
00378 /******************************************************************************/
00379 template <class DataType>
00380 int DzTArray<DataType>::find( const DataType &obj ) const
00381 {
00382     int     i;
00383     DataType    *ptr = m_items;
00384 
00385     for( i = 0; i < m_nItems; i++, ++ptr ) {
00386         if( obj == *ptr )
00387             return i;
00388     }
00389     return -1;
00390 }
00391 
00392 /******************************************************************************/
00393 template <class DataType>
00394 void DzTArray<DataType>::copyValues( const DzTArray<DataType> &from )
00395 {
00396     clear();
00397 
00398     if( from.m_nItems > 0 )
00399         append( from.m_nItems, from.m_items );
00400 
00401     m_blockGrowSize = from.m_blockGrowSize;
00402 }
00403 
00404 /******************************************************************************/
00405 template <class DataType>
00406 bool DzTArray<DataType>::addSpace( int num, bool keepExisting )
00407 {
00408     int         i;
00409     int         newSize;
00410     DataType    *ptr;
00411 
00412     if( num <= 0 ){
00413         DZ_WARNING( QString( "Invalid size '%1' passed to DzTArray::addSpace()" ).arg( num ) );
00414         return false;
00415     }
00416 
00417     newSize = m_nSlots + num;
00418     
00419     if ( newSize <= 0 )
00420     {
00421         DZ_WARNING( QString( "Invalid size '%1' passed to DzTArray::addSpace()" ).arg( num ) );
00422         return false;
00423     }
00424     
00425     DataType *newItems = new DataType[newSize];
00426 
00427     // Make sure the memory allocation was successful.
00428     m_nSlots = newSize;
00429 
00430     if( keepExisting ) {
00431         for( i = 0, ptr = m_items; i < m_nItems; ++i, ++ptr )
00432             newItems[i] = *ptr;
00433     }
00434 
00435     if( m_items )
00436         delete [] m_items;
00437     m_items = newItems;
00438 
00439     return true;
00440 }
00441 
00442 /******************************************************************************/
00443 template <class DataType>
00444 void DzTArray<DataType>::clearAndFree()
00445 {
00446     delete [] m_items;
00447     m_items = 0;
00448     m_nItems = 0;
00449     m_nSlots = 0;
00450 }
